transcript:
Customer: [Music]

Hello

Hello

Hello
Executive: A mam na India mart se baat kar raha hu mam.
Customer: Ketkula madam.
Executive: Yes mam mam abhi recently aapka profile register kar rahe hai India mart me.
Customer: Aama.
Executive: A so aapka side se jo hai na kal receive hua tha but humara side se executive pick nahi kiya tha uske liye ticket raise hua hai kya issue hai ya just doubt ke liye call kiya tha.
Customer: Therila miss call and kutten.
Executive: A uske liye ticket raise hua hai so aapko kuch issue hai mam so uske liye call kar raha hu.
Customer: Illa illa sir illa sir.
Executive: Mam clear kar dijiye.
Customer: Illa onnu illa onnu illa mam illa abhi aapko live me aa gaya aapka profile live me aa gaya aap leads le sakte hai.
Customer: Sir website ka link share kijiye sir share nahi kiya.
Executive: Catalog hi puch rahe hai.
Customer: Aama sir catalog.
Executive: Catalog okay mai aapko share karta hu so aapko account manager assign kar denge theek hai aapka profile live me aane ke baad aapko account manager assign kar denge aapka profile aaj morning mere pass receive hua hai so mai handle kar raha hu aapko kuch doubt hai to aap mera number pe call kar sakte hai mera name Anguraj mai aapko whatsapp number se message karta hu aap us number pe Anguraj.
Customer: Anbu raja ya Ambu raja sir.
Executive: A N G U R A J mam Anguraj.
Customer: A N
Executive: G U
Customer: G U illaiya.
Executive: Yes okay anyway name whatsapp.
Customer: Okay okay okay done.
Executive: Okay so uske liye contact kiya mam aap save kar lijiye lead bhi aap le sakte hai aap puch rahe hai catalog link mai share karta hu aapko so humara side se aapko overall guidance ke liye welcome meet connect karenge mam.
Customer: Okay sir thoda one hour two hour busy aama uske baad call kar sakte hai.
Executive: Abhi nahi abhi nahi mujhe waha se schedule meet assign karenge mujhe one minute.
Customer: Sir sir meeting me join me emergency attend line me aara sir.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Meeting me join me emergency attend line me aara sir.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called due to a missed call.

- Customer requested website catalog link.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed profile is live.

- Executive offered to share the catalog link.

- Executive provided his contact details.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share catalog link.

- Welcome meet will be scheduled.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, profile, buyleads, welcome meet
